name: Krystal Kart AR
description:
Experience the thrill of drifting through fast looping tracks and immerse yourself in the wonders of AR as you race into a new reality.

Set in a remote area of the galaxy, you are challenged to beat the competition to the finish line. Krystal Kart features stylized visuals, fun physics, and fast drift based racing.

Features:

- Competitive multiplayer
- Challenging single player modes
- Stylized art style and sci-fi environments
- Fast-paced, fun drifting style gameplay
- 3 different ways to drive your car


IMPORTANT: Krystal Kart is an Augmented Reality game. This means you play through your camera on real surfaces, such as your kitchen table.

TIPS: For the best gameplay experience you will need a flat, detailed surface with good lighting. Low light or single-colored surfaces are less suitable, as is playing inside a moving vehicle.
